src_original: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya // Saund_5.47 //
tgt_original: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya ||47 ||

src_original: aniṣṭamapyauṣadhamāturāya dadāti vaidyaśca yathā nigṛhya /
tgt_original: aniṣṭamapyauṣadhamāturāya dadāti vaidyaśca yathā nigṛhya |

src_original: tadvanmayoktaṃ pratikūlametattubhyaṃ hitodarkamanugrahāya // Saund_5.48 //
tgt_original: tadvanmayoktaṃ pratikūlametattubhyaṃ hitodarkamanugrahāya ||48 ||

src_original: tadyāvadeva kṣaṇasaṃnipāto na mṛtyurāgacchati yāvadeva /
tgt_original: tadyāvadeva kṣaṇasaṃnipāto na mṛtyurāgacchati yāvadeva |

src_original: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva // Saund_5.49 //
tgt_original: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva ||49 ||

src_original: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ /
tgt_original: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ |

src_original: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca // Saund_5.50 //
tgt_original: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca ||50 ||

src_original: ādāya vaidehamunistatastaṃ nināya saṃśliṣya viceṣṭamānam /
tgt_original: ādāya vaidehamunistatastaṃ nināya saṃśliṣya viceṣṭamānam |

src_original: vyayojayaccāśrupariplutākṣaṃ keśaśriyaṃ chatranibhasya mūrdhnaḥ // Saund_5.51 //
tgt_original: vyayojayaccāśrupariplutākṣaṃ keśaśriyaṃ chatranibhasya mūrdhnaḥ ||51 ||

src_original: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu /
tgt_original: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu |

src_original: vakrāgranālaṃ nalinaṃ taḍāge varṣodakaklinnamivābabhāse // Saund_5.52 //  nandastatastarukaṣāyaviraktavāsāścintāvaśo navagṛhīta iva dvipendraḥ /  pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse // Saund_5.53 //
tgt_original: vakrāgranālaṃ nalinaṃ taḍāge varṣodakaklinnamivābabhāse ||52 ||  nandastatastarukaṣāyaviraktavāsāścintāvaśo navagṛhīta iva dvipendraḥ |  pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse ||53 ||

src_original: saundarananda kāvye “nandadīkṣā” nāma pañcama sarga samāpta /
tgt_original: saundarananda kāvye “nanda-dīkṣā“ nāma pañcama sarga samāpta |
